segments.text: what do you hope to do when you finish university ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ d like to go into management . I ’ Ve applied for several jobs already and I ’ m hopeful that I ’ ll get some job offers . How about you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: after I graduate , I have to do some more studies to pass exams to become a lawyer . I think I ’ Ve got a good chance of passing . There ’ s a possibility of getting a job with a law firm in London , provide
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: we both have to overcome several obstacles if we are to achieve our ambitions .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: if life were easy , then we ’ d achieve our ambition quickly and then get bored .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: unfortunately , it ’ s inevitable that some people are going to work hard yet not succeed .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: that ’ s why ambition need to be realistic . You can ’ t achieve something that ’ s totally unrealistic .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: as long as you plan carefully , most thing are possible . It ’ s always good to have a backup plan in case things go wrong .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think it ’ s important to be successful in a field you are truly interested in , not something that other people force you to be interested it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: my father wanted me to become a doctor , but I knew it would be impossible for me to be successful in that field .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope my parents don ’ t try to interfere in my choice of career .
segments.speaker: S1
